app_name: Groups Control Groups Photo and Video Editing Apps ShowCut Video Editor Maker
app_description: ShowCut A free video editing app for video editing beginners. 1500 theme template videos with music transition effect filter text emoji and sticker etc. Make video with One Click and let everyone can be a video creator! An Easy to Use Video Editor Are those video editing apps too complicated for you It s not hard to edit video. Try ShowCut three steps to make video: 1. Choose a template 2. Import your videos and photos or take some pictures 3. Export video with One Click! 1500 Theme Video Template Celebrate 2021 festival holiday like Christmas New Year s Eve Diwali Eid al Fitr etc Make your selfie alive Save birthday memory Record honeymoon witness wedding and anniversary Turn family album to video collage photo mv Create vlog for travel party graduation etc Create story intro video for your channel Memory album: record every moment you cherish Feel Lucky: take a picture auto apply a template for you Even make funny video to prank your friend LOL Video Editing Merge video crop video clips Mute video clips Video loop Support video formats: mp4 mov avi H.264 H265. Photo Editing Photo layout: crop photos to square fit Selfie remove background: add effects to selfies or insert yourself into interesting background environments Face Selfie mirror Support image formats: jpg jpeg gif png. Music Sound Effect Edit video with music: template has preset music Lots of sound effects. Filter and Effect Video effects like beats glitch slow motion noise retro DV etc Cool filters like polaroid filter old filter movie filter for video Preset filters are adjust brightness contrast curves and etc. Video Transition Effect Combine clips with smooth transition effects Make your video more eye catching editing video like a Pro editor. Sticker Gif Text Emoji Add texts effect fonts song lyrics and emojis on video Add meme stickers gifs on video. Export HD Video Fast export 720p HD video Export 1080p Full HD video ShowCut PRO subscription required . Share Want to become a meme maker video star or vlog star Share your videos to social apps like WhatsApp tiktok Instagram YouTube etc. ShowCut PRO By subscribing to ShowCut PRO you will receive the following services: Unlimited use PRO templates Export 1080p Full HD video No watermark No ads As the app developer we will continue to improve ShowCut experience As the edit app video maker we will continue to improve our edit tool: edit video edit photo and edit music filters and effects features As the video template app we will add more theme templates cover more festivals holidays Anniversary events and etc. Terms of Use: https: www.apple.com legal internet services itunes dev stdeula Privacy Policy: https: showcut.app privacypolicy.html Feel free to contact us: support showcut.app Your feedback and suggestions are important to us!
